statements: UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = 1

UPDATE review SET review_text = 'Highly recommended', timestamp = NOW(), customer_id = 2 WHERE review_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET review_text = 'Great product, highly recommended!', rating = 5 WHERE review_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
